eventName: [Workshop] Beyond ELK: Elastic Stack in Practice
eventDescription: This session explores real-world Elastic Stack usage, from core ELK fundamentals to production-ready architectures, covering scaling strategies, performance tuning, and best practices for teams running Elastic at scale.
eventVenue: SQ1 Security Technology Private Limited: 2nd Floor Block B, International Tech Park, Futura Tech Park, Rajiv Gandhi Salai, OMR, Sholinganallur, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600119
